fullplot: In A BIGGER SPLASH, the lives of a high profile couple, a famous rock star and a filmmaker, (Matthias Schoenaerts and Tilda Swinton) vacationing and recovering on the idyllic sun-drenched and remote Italian island of Pantelleria are disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter (Ralph Fiennes and Dakota Johnson) - creating a whirlwind of jealousy, passion and, ultimately, danger for everyone involved.
plot: The vacation of a famous rock star and a filmmaker is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.
title: A Bigger Splash
